00035 namespace control {

00037 
00038 /**
00039  * Computational state of Manipulator
00040  */
00041 class ManipulatorState : public base::ReferencedObject
00042 {
00043 public:
00044   ManipulatorState(ref<robot::Manipulator> manipulator);

00046 
00047   virtual String className() const { return String("ManipulatorState"); }

00049 
00050 
00051   ref<robot::SerialManipulator> manipulator; // description of the manipulator
00052   
00053   Int M, N; ///< M - joint space size, N - task space size (e.g. pos,orient==6)
00054 };
